
What follows are simple grid tables:

+-------------+--------------+
| Left Header | Right Header |
+=============+==============+
| Cell 1      | Cell 2       |
+-------------+--------------+
| Cell 3      | Cell 4       |
+-------------+--------------+

+--------------+
| Upper Header |
+--------------+
| Lower Header |
+==============+
| Cell 1       |
+--------------+
| Cell 3       |
+--------------+

+--------------+--------------+
| Left Header  | Right Header |
+==============+==============+
| Cell 1 with  | Cell 2       |
| wrapped text |              |
+--------------+--------------+
| Cell 3       | Cell 4 with  |
|              | wrapped text |
+--------------+--------------+
